Title: Peller’s management says influencer is safe, urges public to ignore rumours
Summary: Management of popular TikTok influencer Habeeb Hamzat, popularly known as Peller, has said he is safe, in good health, and not in any danger . Peller’s management urges public to ignore rumours surrounding his well-being .

Title: NDIC insists Ikoyi property sale to Senator Bunza remains terminated
Summary: NDIC insists there is no binding agreement between it and Senator Farouk Bello Bunza over the disputed Ikoyi property . The Nigerian Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC) has refused to accept revised terms .

Title: Gov Yusuf unveils Kano Digital Engagement Platform to enhance citizens participation
Summary: Gov Yusuf unveils Kano Digital Engagement Platform to enhance citizens participation . Fix Kano App is a digital citizens’ engagement platform designed to enable residents to report issues requiring government attention and track the status of their reports .

Title: Kano govt partners FG to resume Wuju-Wuju Road project
Summary: Kano State Governor, Alhaji Abba Kabir Yusuf, has announced that the state government, in partnership with the Federal Government, will resume the Wuju-Wuju road project, abandoned for the past ten years . The governor expressed satisfaction with the development .

Title: Airtel, Starlink to expand mobile coverage in remote Nigerian areas
Summary: Airtel Africa has announced a partnership with SpaceX to introduce Starlink’s Direct-to-Cell satellite connectivity across its 14 African markets, including Nigeria . The service aims to extend mobile coverage to areas where conventional network infrastructure is limited or unavailable .

Title: PDP draws battle line as 2027 reset begins
Summary: Wabara stressed that unity remained the party’s most urgent task, calling on aggrieved members at all levels to return to the fold .

Title: Trump deploys military to Ecuador for anti-drugs operation
Summary: The personnel will be deployed at Ecuador's Manta air force base . The base had served as a US base for a decade until 2009 .

Title: Wike reinstates FCT education mandate secretary, IRS acting chairman
Summary: Wike's aide explained that the minister, warning against indiscipline among FCT Administration officials, directed Hayyo and Ango to resume duty with immediate effect .

Title: Makinde blames elites for disunity in the country
Summary: Governor of Oyo State, Mr Seyi Makinde says Nigerian elites are responsible for disunity and division in the country . Makindi stated this in Abuja on Wednesday at the public presentation of a book titled: ” Headlines and Soundbites: Media Moments that Defined an Administration” The book is authored

Title: Opposition urges inclusive approach to 2026 tax reform
Summary: The National Opposition Movement of Nigeria has urged the Federal Government to consider a phased and consultative approach to the planned national tax regime scheduled for Jan. 1, 2026 .
